function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Analysis of people's migration patterns leading to privacy concerns and ethical implications","Impact":"Invasion of privacy and potential misuse of personal data","Mitigation":"Implement strict data protection regulations and guidelines for data usage, anonymize data before analysis","Technologies":"Anonymization tools, encryption methods","People":"General public, individuals whose data is being analyzed","Owner":"Data protection authorities, organizations using the data for analysis"},{"Description":"Misuse of contact tracing data for unethical purposes","Impact":"Breach of individuals' privacy and potential harm from misuse of contact tracing information","Mitigation":"Strict regulations on data access and usage, transparent protocols for data handling","Technologies":"Secure data storage, access control technologies","People":"General public, individuals participating in contact tracing","Owner":"Health authorities, organizations responsible for contact tracing"},{"Description":"Dependency on technology for COVID-19 detection and monitoring","Impact":"Risk of over-reliance on technology leading to neglect of traditional public health measures","Mitigation":"Promote a balanced approach to public health, educate on the limitations of technology","Technologies":"Public health education tools, community engagement platforms","People":"Healthcare providers, public health authorities","Owner":"Health organizations, government health departments"}]}
